attributes.action: Save Easington village from another wind turbine
attributes.additional_details:
SAVE EASINGTON VILLAGE (HU12 0UA) FROM ANOTHER WIND TURBINE.

An application for a wind turbine has been submitted to East Riding of Yorkshire Council on Eastfield Road (Peters Lane), Easington.

This turbine location is far closer than any current turbines and would set an unwanted precedence should it be successful.
Stop the proposal of yet another poorly sited Wind turbine which will have a negative affect on the countryside, seaside, riverside, migrating and local birds, and animals.
Protect us from the;
Visual impact,
Degradation of Heritage Coast,
Migrating birds,

Stop this planning application to prevent  Holderness peninsula being covered in wind turbines.

Your early attention to this matter would be appreciated as the Consultant cleverly submitted the application just before Christmas to reduce the amount of time to stop this.
